rows.label: qev025110_MSG0001
rows.name: Excuse me, but are you [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0002
rows.name:
I thought so. You look just like he described.
So he must have also been right when he said I could
depend on you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0003
rows.name: Er, sorry. I'm Jim, a fellow BLADE. I work with Ackwar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0004
rows.name:
I've been all over New LA trying to find him, but no
dice. Then I thought maybe you'd know where he was,
so I switched to looking for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev025110_SEL0011
rows.name: Admit you don't know where Ackwar is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_JNK0020
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev025110_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if Jim is sure Ackwar isn't in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0005
rows.name: I see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0006
rows.name:
Far as I know, he'd just returned from Noctilum when
he suddenly left town again. Poor guy was pretty
panicked from the sound of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0007
rows.name:
Far as I know, he'd just returned from Noctilum when
he suddenly left town again. Poor guy was pretty
panicked from the sound of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev025110_SEL0031
rows.name: Find out where Jim thinks Ackwar may be.

rows.label: qev025110_JNK0040
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev025110_SEL0041
rows.name: Offer to help look for Ackwar.

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0008
rows.name:
I heard a rumor he was seen near Keegan Ridge
over in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0009
rows.name:
I suppose I could... Wait, are you thinking of heading
there to find him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0010
rows.name: You're thinking of going after him? Really?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well, if you are, I heard a rumor he was seen
near Keegan Ridge over in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0012
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0013
rows.name:
Thanks. I've been itching to go look myself,
but I'm not really equipped to survive out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0014
rows.name:
I really appreciate you offering to do this.
Ackwar's great, but he's got a hasty streak to him,
so someone needs to make sure he's safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0015
rows.name:
Thanks for offering to help. You're living up to
Ackwar's glowing description of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0016
rows.name:
You should start by checking near Keegan Ridge
over in Oblivia, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0017
rows.name:
If you catch up with Ackwar, please help him in
whatever way you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0018
rows.name:
Hey, [ST:playername ]! You're back!
Did you find Ackwar?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0019
rows.name: ...What? Powell killed him? You mean the pizza guy?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0020
rows.name: But you "took care of" Powell? I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0021
rows.name:
Well, I guess that means Ackwar's case is closed.
And maybe the rest of these other cases, as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0022
rows.name:
Ackwar had been on the hunt for this serial murderer
from the start, so I'm sure he'll rest easier knowing you
finished it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0023
rows.name: Thank you... Oh, and please take this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0024
rows.name:
Ackwar was always quick to rush in on his own.
I'd usually get stuck cleaning up his messes, but...
Well, to tell the truth, I envied him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0025
rows.name:
Human... Ma-non... None of that ever mattered to him.
He had this fire. This sense of justice. And that's what
kept driving him forward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0026
rows.name: He was the bravest of BLADEs. ...I'll never forget him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0027
rows.name: Excuse me, but are you [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0028
rows.name: Thought so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0029
rows.name:
I'm Jim. I work with Ackwar.
He left me a message to give to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0030
rows.name:
He said to meet him at Keegan Ridge over in Oblivia
ASAP. Er, you wouldn't happen to know what this is
about, would you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_JNK0050
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev025110_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Jim that Ackwar is chasing Yuyu's killer.

rows.label: qev025110_JNK0060
rows.name: Say Nothing

rows.label: qev025110_SEL0061
rows.name: Keep what you know to yourself.

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0031
rows.name: Yuyu's dead? So that's why he looked so frantic...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0032
rows.name:
Dammit, Ackwar! You could have told me!
Maybe I could have helped you for once...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0033
rows.name: But I guess you're the only one who can help him now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0034
rows.name:
Not talking, eh? Ackwar was right about you.
Said you were trustworthy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0035
rows.name:
He wouldn't tell me anything, either. Just said this was
one perp he had to bring in on his own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0036
rows.name:
I don't know what happened, but please help
him any way you can. He's a good friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_JNK0070
rows.name: Promise

rows.label: qev025110_SEL0071
rows.name: Swear to bring Ackwar home safe.

rows.label: qev025110_JNK0080
rows.name: Hedge

rows.label: qev025110_SEL0081
rows.name: Don't make any promises.

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0037
rows.name:
Coming from you, I believe it. Ackwar said you're as
dependable as they come.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0038
rows.name:
I'll let you be the one to clean up after the loose
Ma-non cannon this time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0039
rows.name: Not very optimistic, are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0040
rows.name:
Still, I suppose a level head is for the best.
Someone has to balance out that loose cannon
Ackwar, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0041
rows.name:
I'll leave Ackwar to you. If he goes off the rails,
I'm trusting you to reel him back in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0042
rows.name:
Ackwar said to meet him at Keegan Ridge over in
Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025110_MSG0043
rows.name: Please help him. You're the only one who can.[ST:wait ]
